answers.answer: James, I have the same issues and much more do you have any other symptoms?  You probably need a neuroligist.

Hello.Burning sensation in the toes and fingertips is a sign of peripheral neuropathy. Is this problem recent?Diabetes is a common cause of peripheral neuropathy. Excess of blood sugar interferes with signal transmission. Have you checked your blood sugar?Another cause could be vitamin deficiency, especially vitamin B12. Please get a blood work done for these two conditions.Regards

question: The tips of my fingers and toes are burning,,, Im concerned,, What isit?
title: foot and hand burning
